com.google.enterprise.connector.util.database.testing
Class TestLocalDatabase

java.lang.Object
  com.google.enterprise.connector.util.database.LocalDatabaseImpl
      com.google.enterprise.connector.util.database.testing.TestLocalDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
LocalDatabase
public class TestLocalDatabase
extends com.google.enterprise.connector.util.database.LocalDatabaseImpl

A LocalDatabase implementation that uses an in-memory H2 database for storage and looks for DatabaseResourceBundles relative to the current directory or specified resource directory. Connector developers may want to use this to implement unit tests.

Since:
2.8

Constructor Detail

TestLocalDatabase

public TestLocalDatabase(java.lang.String connectorTypeName,
                         java.io.File resourceDir)
Constructs a TestLocalDatabase for the named connector type.

Parameters:
connectorTypeName - name will be used to identify resource bundles.
resourceDir - directory that is the root of resources. If null, the current directory is used.
